about.title: We .push the limits
about.paragraph_1: We are a fullstack web development company based in Turin, currently working side by side with UX and creative agencies to build unique digital experiences for Brands, NGO, Museums and Institutions.
about.paragraph_2: Thanks to a 15+ years experience and continuous updating on emerging open source technologies we can empower your project with the most suitable and cost-effective stack.
about.paragraph_3: We mainly work on not-disclosable project, please contact us for a private pitch.
